name: Language Notice For Multilanguage Site
author: Antonio Lamorgese

sections.description:
Language Notice For Multilanguage Site automatically adds a block containing the link to read the Post in the current language if available.

Support

Please submit bugs, patches, and feature requests to:

[https://github.com/antoniolamorgese/language-notice-for-multilanguage-site]
sections.installation:
The plugin is simple to install:

  1. Download ‘language-notice-for-multilanguage-site.zip’
  2. Unzip
  3. Upload ‘language-notice-for-multilanguage-site’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory, or install the plugin throught the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Wait, it’s free?

Yes, it’s really free. There’s no premium version and no need to pay money to get access to features.
